snippet: Jenny Rocha’s evening-length work “Mandorla” featured lively choreography that borrowed just as much from hip-hop as it did from ballet.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews dance piece Mandorla, choreographed and performed by Jenny Rocha at Here Arts Center.
lead_paragraph: Jenny Rocha’s evening-length work “Mandorla” featured lively choreography that borrowed just as much from hip-hop as it did from ballet.

headline.seo: ‘Mandorla’ by Jenny Rocha at Here Arts Center
headline.main: There Go Starving Artists, Trying It All, Even the Lotto
headline.print_headline: There Go Starving Artists, Trying It All, Even the Lotto
